General.Name: Silver Dollar Resources Inc
General.Description: Silver Dollar Resources Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for silver, copper, and gold deposits. It has an option to acquire 100% interest in the La Joya silver project consisting of 15 mineral concessions covering an area of 4,646 hectares located in the State of Durango, Mexico; the Longlegged Lake property consisting of 8 multi-cell mining claims covering an area of approximately 2,597 hectares located in the Red Lake Mining Division in northwestern Ontario; and the Pakwash Lake property consisting of 18 mining claims covering an area of approximately 4,252 hectares located in the Red Lake Mining Division in northwestern Ontario. Silver Dollar Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Victoria, Canada.
General.Address: 179-2945 Jacklin Road, Victoria, BC, Canada, V9B 6J9
